HPI 8152 NISMO GT-R LM

Manufacturer page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/news/campaign20100424/index.php

Another fantasy GT-R LM. This one is a plain color version of the Le Mans race car. The model is a limited edition of 300 produced for Minicar Fan magazine and was an HPI Web Special. Note that this one does not have the window issues of the resin GT-R LM road car [urlhttp://www.scale143.com/viewtopic.php?f=31&t=8649&p=302937#p302118]above[/url].
